name: Dynasty Feud
description: Dynasty Feud is a competitive, team-based, fast-paced platform brawler for 2-4 players. Play either local or online and show off your skills with 40 characters, one-hit kills, multiple fighting skills and a lot of style.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel I5 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia 550 or better DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
